intro: Psychotria laticalyx, commonly known as the broad-leaved psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in dense tropical forests. Due to its ornamental value and potential medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and research settings.
